products.title: Cedar Grey & Paloma Wooden Blind - 50mm Slat
products.description: We dont need to tell you how stylish grey is, just like we dont need to tell you how its making its mark as the new neutral of the interior fashion world. Besides, the proof is right here with the cedar grey wooden blind with paloma tapes. Its simply marvelous. So ditch th we dont need to tell you how stylish grey is, just like we dont need to tell you how its making its mark as the new neutral of the interior fashion world.

products.title: Kalmar, Slate - Venetian Blind
products.description: When you add kalmar slate to your home you get to sit back and enjoy a subtle design that offers you different looks and shades as the light level in your space changes. With a broad spectrum of on-trend greys each vying for your attention you'll have nothing else to do but sit back and enjoy the visual. Combining slate with a couple of complimentary dark accessories in an otherwise light and breezy room is the way to get the most out of it.

products.title: Cosmopolitan Anchor Grey Wooden Blind - 50mm Slat
products.description: Deep dark grey is a force to be reckoned with. And with these cosmopolitan anchor grey wooden blinds, tuiss have got you covered. With a lovely distressed wood look and only the finest components, this blind is an absolute gem in the tuiss repertoire.

products.title: Cosmopolitan Seattle Grey Wooden Blind - 50mm Slat
products.description: A wooden blind may be a classic choice for window dressing, but that doesnt mean it cant be perfect for a contemporary look too. The soft grey tone is crisp and sleek, the distressed effect of the finish lending visual interest to each and every slat, creating a look that a wooden blind may be a classic choice for window dressing, but that doesnt mean it cant be perfect for a contemporary look too.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe, Silverton Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: If you love the luxury look and feel of cotswold silverton grey then why not take a look at their deluxe option complete with exquisite fabric ribbons? With a unique look that you won't find anywhere else you'll be able to dress your home to impress like never before. We love the look and feel of pairing silverton grey with a mixture of whites, creams, and light greys in the guest bedroom. That way you can create a clean and crisp look that your guests will never want to leave.

products.title: Kalmar Deluxe, Slate - Venetian Blind
products.description: Kalmar slate deluxe is the perfect way to allow your home to really make a statement. With a rich variety of greys that allow you to see something different every time you look at them you'll be able to coordinate with your favourite shades as you reinvent any room in the house. Think about the contrasts you can create with light walls and floors and darker eye-catching accessories like scatter cushions and a lampshade.

products.title: Vermont Metropolitan Grey Mist & Glacier Wooden Blind - 50mm Slat
products.description: A neutral window dressing doesn't come much more chic than this little beauty. Light and bright wooden slats are presented in a mushroomy grey tone that preserves the natural vibe of the solid basswood they're cut from, offset by a set of decorative tapes in a matching eart a neutral window dressing doesn't come much more chic than this little beauty.

products.title: Vermont Slate & Dusk Wooden Blind - 50mm Slat
products.description: Dark and seriously stylish, this vermont slate & dusk wooden blind takes the timeless appeal of a wooden blind and brings it right up to date. The broody grey slats are deep and dark, contrasting in striking fashion with light or white walls, complemented by light woode dark and seriously stylish, this vermont slate & dusk wooden blind takes the timeless appeal of a wooden blind and brings it right up to date.

products.title: Vermont Cedar Grey & Paloma Wooden Blind - 50mm Slat
products.description: Take a classic blind and drizzle over some serious 21st century chic and what do you get? You get this stunning vermont cedar grey & paloma wooden blind. The smoky grey shade of the slats is the ultimate modern neutral, fitting in anywhere and everywhere, but especially in a take a classic blind and drizzle over some serious 21st century chic and what do you get? You get this stunning vermont cedar grey & paloma wooden blind.

products.title: Metropolitan Grey Mist & Glacier Wooden Blind - 50mm Slat
products.description: A beautifully soft grey tone, this metropolitan wooden blind is perfect for a contemporary setting. It's shot through with lovely organic grains and we've paired with with a soft fabric tape for a sophisticated look. Offering easy light control this blind is lightweight but h a beautifully soft grey tone, this metropolitan wooden blind is perfect for a contemporary setting.

products.title: Slate & Dusk Wooden Blind - 50mm Slat
products.description: Give your home a modern update with this slate & dusk wooden blind. The strong wooden slats and deep shaded soft tapes offset each other whilst really working into the other one's hands. What's more, the real wood slats are seasoned for extra durability and painted with the give your home a modern update with this slate & dusk wooden blind.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe, Marble Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: In a matt, chalky paint, the cotswold deluxe in marble grey displays a chic light grey tone on wide wooden slats that tilt with ease for versatile light and air control. Coordinating ladder tapes are an effective feature, providing a matching, coherent look for sleek designer vogue. Match the marble grey with a soft sky blue for a cool and contemporary look and a tranquil ambience in a baby's nursery.

products.title: Moonstone & Stone Wooden Blind With Tapes - 50mm Slat
products.description: Softly, softly, oh so softly. This wooden blind is a beautiful mix of softly coloured moonstone slat and coordinating tape in stone. The slat, painted in moonstone is light grey with an undercurrent of mushroom while the tape is rich oatmeal. The marriage of colours will crea softly, softly, oh so softly.
